full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/28/2023 * U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE: 1984-441-967 U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Memorandum of Creation of Record Immigration and Naturalization Service of Lawful Permanent Residence Place LOS File No. A28 729 371 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: NA Sex 1 Male Date of Birth (Month/Day/Year) Name Francisca SANCHEZ-ZEPEDA 2 In Care Of Female 10-04-12 Street 7602 San Vicente Ave. City of Birth Country of Birth Address Paramount, CA 90723 Nagarote Nicaragua Apt. No. Country of Nationality Country of Last Residence City, State, Zip Nicaragua Nicaragua Marital Status 1 Single 2 Married Occupation N/I Class at time of Adj.
